skills.name: VIOLENT SWINGS
desc: • Deals physical and magic damage to a single target.
• Gain a Random Offensive Beneficial Effect on each hit.
• 25% Chance to Remove Immunity, including Perfect Immunity, Remove Immortality, including Perfect Immortality, and Remove Shroud on each hit.

skills.name: TERRORIZE
desc: • 65% Chance to Remove Beneficial Effects from all enemies.
• Inflicts Fear on all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: DEATHPROOF
desc: Grants Immunity to Permadeath, Perfect Corruption, and Fear effects to all allies for the duration of the battle. Immunity to all Stun effects for self.
